sentences.en: a girl in a blue dress and ankle socks
sentences.cn: 身穿蓝色连衣裙和套袜的女孩

sentences.en: Gavin Hastings was helped from the field with ankle injuries.
sentences.cn: 加文·黑斯廷斯脚踝受伤，被扶下了场。

sentences.en: He had wrenched his ankle badly from the force of the fall.
sentences.cn: 他因摔倒而严重扭伤了脚踝。

sentences.en: He slipped on the stairs and put his ankle out.
sentences.cn: 他在楼梯上滑了一跤,踝关节脱臼了.

sentences.en: He sprained his ankle and had to be helped home.
sentences.cn: 他扭了脚脖子,我们只得把他架回去.

sentences.en: He winced as the dog nipped his ankle.
sentences.cn: 狗咬了他的脚腕子，疼得他龇牙咧嘴。

sentences.en: Her ankle caught on a root, and she almost lost her balance.
sentences.cn: 她的脚踝被树根绊了一下，差点摔倒。

sentences.en: His teeth clicked as he snapped at my ankle.
sentences.cn: 它猛地朝我的脚脖子咬下去，牙齿还咔咔直响。

sentences.en: I stumbled and sprained my ankle.
sentences.cn: 我摔了一跤，把脚脖子扭了。
约翰的脚脖子崴得很严重。

sentences.en: My aunt has slipped down in the street and hurt her ankle.
sentences.cn: 我姑姑在大街上滑倒了,摔伤了脚踝.

sentences.en: Presently George's ankle began to throb with pain.
sentences.cn: 不一会儿，乔治的脚踝就开始一阵阵地疼。

sentences.en: She had a Band-Aid on her ankle.
sentences.cn: 她的脚踝上贴着创可贴。

sentences.en: She tore ligament in her ankle while she was playing squash.
sentences.cn: 她在打壁球时把踝部韧带拉伤了.

sentences.en: The mud is ankle deep around Shush Square.
sentences.cn: 舒什广场周围的泥水深及脚踝。

trans.tran_en: the joint between your foot and your leg
